title: Should Strava Cull Its High Speed Segments? London Group Calls for Removal of Popular Loop After Fatal Crash
content:
'City Parks' group pushes for removal of notorious chain-gang segment in London's Regent's Park after pedestrian dies in cyclist collision.

Read the full article at Should Strava Cull Its High Speed Segments? London Group Calls for Removal of Popular Loop After Fatal Crash on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
